text: Plants, Zombies, and projectiles have different properties called "height."
$(br2)An entity's height influence how they interact with others.
$(br2)Small entities avoid damage that is too high up there, e.g. Imps dodging the highest pea of a Pea Pod.
$(br2)Low Profile entities avoid most damage unless it targets the ground, e.g. Spikeweeds and Snorkel Zombies.
$(br2)Tall entities can interact with Flying ones, but they are still affected by other entities, e.g. tallnutSv2 blocking Flying Zombies and normal Zombies.
$(br2)Big Zombies are oversized Zombies that are immune to most instant-kills. Gargantuars are another type of Big Zombie, they hit Flying Plants.
$(br)Flying entities interact with tall and above entities, e.g. Jetpack Zombie flying over most plants, or Loquat only being eaten by tall or flying zombies like Bully and Jetpack.
$(br)In addition, plants like Cherry Bomb can interact with Flying Zombies, while small plants like Potato Mine and Iceberg Lettuce, even though they work similarly, can't.
$(br)Flying Zombies instantly die when stunned. They also take knockback from Wind attacks if they don't have protection.

$(br)Some plants specially target a specific type of entity, e.g. Gargantuars target Low Profiles; Dandelion Weeds, Cattails, etc target Flying Zombies; and lobbing plants target Low Profile Zombies and Flying Zombies.
$(br2)This mod has a diverse amount of interactions between Plants and Zombies, experiment to find out the intricacies of the systems!
